references.paper_title: Renderdiffusion: Image diffusion for 3d reconstruction, inpainting and generation
references.reason: This paper is foundational to the work presented as it introduces a novel approach to 3D generation using image diffusion, which is the basis for the presented method.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper introduces the 3D Gaussian splatting technique, which is core to the proposed method for its efficiency and quality in rendering 3D objects.

references.paper_title: High-resolution image synthesis with latent diffusion models
references.reason: This paper introduces a powerful image diffusion model that is adapted for 3D generation, providing high-quality 2D image priors and directly generating 3D Gaussian splats.

references.paper_title: Point-e: A system for generating 3d point clouds from complex prompts
references.reason: This paper presents a method for 3D point cloud generation, a related area to the work in this paper that provides a comparative method for 3D object representation.
This paper introduces the foundation of diffusion models, which are the basis for the methods used in this paper to generate the 3D Gaussian splats.
